text: <font face="Calibri" size="4">Evaluate the truthfulness of a statement and the quality of the explanation of its truthfulness judgment. A statement is true if it is based on empirical evidence. An explanation is of high quality if it provides a well-documented and correct explanation of whether the statement that was judged is true or false.</font>
<font face="Calibri" size="4">Evaluate each statement independently. If you are asked to judge the same statement again, do not base your evaluation on the one you have already given.</font>
<font face="Calibri" size="4">Payment is based on the quality of the work completed. Please follow the instructions.</font>
